about_the_game:
Slime Killer is a top-down TDS action game where you have to destroy a huge number of slugs with a variety of weapons. From itself the game is an arena shooter, where every minute the number of enemies becomes more and more, and it becomes harder and harder to survive. Also, slugs are becoming more and more dangerous, so having accumulated a certain amount, you can upgrade your weapon to defeat a huge mega-slug. In the game you will find more than eight types of weapons, various types of slugs, ranging from the smallest and fastest, ending with nuclear and explosive.

key features of the game
  • Intense Arena Shooter: Engage in an adrenaline-pumping top-down TDS experience where you'll face hordes of slugs in an ever-increasingly challenging arena. Test your reflexes and shooting skills as you strive to survive against overwhelming odds.
  • Diverse Weaponry: Equip yourself with a wide selection of over eight unique weapons, each with its own strengths and abilities. Choose the right weapon to counter different types of slugs, from the small and nimble to the devastatingly powerful.
  • Challenging Enemy Variety: Encounter a variety of slugs, ranging from fast-moving and elusive to formidable nuclear and explosive types. Adapt your tactics and upgrade your weapons strategically to overcome these increasingly dangerous foes.
  • Progressive Upgrade System: Accumulate resources throughout the game and invest them wisely to upgrade your weapons. Strengthen your firepower and unlock new abilities to face the ultimate challenge of defeating the massive mega-slug.
  • Increasing Difficulty and Survival Challenge: Brace yourself for escalating waves of enemies as the game progresses. Surviving becomes progressively harder as the number and strength of slugs increase, pushing your skills and endurance to the limit.
